entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Old Crow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:40 a.m. MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -16.6Â°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Blowing snow. High minus 13.
